title: President condemns Karachi blast killing Chinese nationals
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 07 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Monday condemned the blast took place near Karachi airport on Sunday night in which two Chinese nationals were killed.
He expressed his deep grief over the killing of Chinese nationals and conveyed condolence to the bereaved families.
He said that the anti-state elements were poised to damage Pakistanâ€™s progress and prosperity.
Sympathising with the victim families, President Zardari emphasised effective action against the perpetrators of the attack.
